Constraint: Never log PII identifiers to application logs
All PII must be transmitted over TLS 1.2+
Non-active records must be purged after retention period
Email addresses must be collected with opt-in consent
Biometric templates must be stored in isolated data store
Financial account numbers must never appear in URLs or query strings
All PII on decommissioned media must be cryptographically erased
Date of birth must be masked in UI except for authorized roles
Genetic data must not be used for employment or insurance decisions
Breaches involving 500+ records must be reported within 60 days
SSN must be masked to last four digits in all user-facing displays
All PHI at rest must use AES-128 or stronger encryption
Phone numbers require explicit consent before marketing use
